title: The Playgirls 1
description:
This is Book 1 in The Playgirls series, Catch and ReleaseMen are nothing but toys to the Playgirls. Chelsea, Katherine and Alyssa amuse themselves with an invented game of “Catch and Release” every summer, using and abusing the handsome males they come across. The girls have been friends since Junior High where they were dubbed the “Playgirls”. The graduate students’ final year of college is filled with parties, theater, and of course, boy toys!Katherine is a beautiful and talented actress, setting eyes on the new director.Chelsea is a self-proclaimed cougar in the making and prowls the college campus for her newest willing boy to flirt with. Her freshman beau takes the bait, but will another playgirl steal him from beneath her?Alyssa, the quietest of the three, finds herself with more than one man on her “to-do” list. She is torn between an old flame and a rich man’s son, always searching for her perfect match.In 
Catch and Release
 you are introduced to three bold and beautiful women on the cusp of life. There is more to them then men, sex and parties though. They don’t know it yet, but life is never what one expects, and it is about to get complicated.
